item.title: Setup WSL for development
item.description: So you want to develop with Linux but also use some Windows exclusive software (games)? That was my case so I tried some of the alternatives dual-booting, game on Linux, use PowerShell, virtual machines (I didn’t try PCI passthrough with a Windows vm because it need 2 gpus). The sustainable solution I’ve found is to use Windows as my man OS and put al my programming stuff in WSL, but it has a little inconveniences.
